item.title: My Emacs Kit
item.description: This document will be a living document that i’ll attempt to update from time to time Table of Contents Intro Pico and Nano Vim doom emacs emacs28 with native compilation Markdown mode Org mode and babel Intro I’ve been using doom-emacs for over a year now (since March 2021) and this is my personal experiences with it. I do not put a ton of effort into editors, rather I spend a chunk of time intermittently.
